intro: From building a house on wheels to building software that moves people. Every mile, every line of code, every summit has led here.

timeline.title: Built a House on Wheels
timeline.description: Converted a cargo van into a mobile home. Designed the layout, installed solar, built custom cabinetry. Lived on the road for 2 years, working remotely and chasing trails.

timeline.title: Flagstaff, AZ
timeline.description: Landed in the mountains at 7,000 feet. Started serious ultrarunning training. The high altitude and endless trails transformed my running.

timeline.title: Colorado Springs, CO
timeline.description: High altitude training at its finest. Garden of the Gods, Pikes Peak, and endless fourteeners. Started building PathQuest to track my peak bagging adventures.

timeline.title: Santa Barbara, CA
timeline.description: Current home base. Ocean trails, mountain runs, and the perfect climate for year-round training. Building the next generation of outdoor tech.
